name: Acute Lower Back Strain
chief_complaint: I can't bend over without sharp pain in my lower back
physical_findings: tenderness on palpation of lumbar paraspinal muscles
limited range of motion in lumbar flexion
treatment: gradual return to activity with physical therapy exercises
prognosis: Excellent with proper management, typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A common musculoskeletal injury resulting from overuse, poor lifting technique, or sudden awkward movement causing microtears in lumbar muscles or ligaments
